name: unproved
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not having been shown to be true: This unproved allegation suggested that local police were turning a blind eye.
not having been shown to be good enough or to be able to do something: It is relying in large part on developing unproved technology.
More examplesFewer examplesA spokesperson said the charges had been investigated and were unproved. The regulations aim to stop manufacturers from making unproved claims for their products.Ethically, it would not be justified to take a patient off a treatment to try an unproved vaccine. She pointed out that the procedure is new and unproved.
